body.p:
Crab orchard Ky
May 23 1865
Gov. Thos. E. Bramlett
Frankfort Ky
Dear Sir

I hav a Nephew in Prison at Point Lookout Md he was captured the 4th of Last month by our forces he has bin wonded and is very anxious to take the oath and Come to my House he wrightes me the his Name has bin registerd for Some time to take the oath. I am at a loss to no what to do in the case and if you Can do any thing in his case for his early Raleace you will confur a grate favor on your Friend and obt Sert

James Sargent Co G
9th Division U S Military Prison
Point Look Out
Md
Care
Maj Brady
P. S. iff you Can do any thing pleas let me no at once

your Freind Respt
H. G. C.
